channel.title: Machine Ethics on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Ethics on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 30, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the 6th chapter of the AI Safety Book, which delves into the philosophical and technical challenges of machine ethics and ensuring that AI systems not only avoid harm but actively promote beneficial outcomes.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 10, 2025
item.description: A diary entry summarizing chapters 6-10 of the ‘Introduction to AI Safety, Ethics, and Society’ textbook, covering beneficial AI, machine ethics, collective action problems, governance, and utility functions.
